title: The Orb of Fire
description: Beyond the mountain of Griggs, seek an old man called Hashu living in the woods of madness. He can guide you to the entrance of an old cave. Search that cave carefully, If you're able to find the hidden room of treasures. There you'll find a golden box within the treasures. Bring it back to me and you'll be rewarded generously.

title: Azureus
description: Azureus is a sea monster that was mentioned in the book of captain Ozura. It's a blind creature that can manipulate all sorts of sea creatures. Multiple attacks have been reported since last week of sea creatures going crazy and attacking sailors for no reason. We need to get rid of it as soon as possible. The emperor promised a big bounty to whoever captures this creature dead or alive.

title: Guard the queen of diamonds
description: The queen requires 4 guards to accompany her in her journey to the lands of Kakarom where she'll meet with the king of iron.
